job.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAt Starship were working hard to create the healthy future we all deserve by transforming the way people pay for healthcare Were passionate about empowering our customers to take greater control of their financial health and personal wellness building a better tomorrow through superior technology and user experienceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtLaunched in 2018 our team of engineers designers and strategists are redefining the 65 billion health saving industry by building innovative solutions for saving spending and investing for healthcare Were bringing together exceptional talent from various disciplines and industries to shape the future of health savings and improve the lives of our customersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAs Software Engineer youll work alongside our Senior Engineering Manager to take our product to the next level by tightening integration and enhancing compliance with industry standards In this role youd work on architecting designing and implementing a system where delivering secure information in real time is essentialltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe seek out engineers who are hardskilled software pros but also thinkers and tinkerers who find creative solutions for complex problems and challenge the status quo We love automation code review and continuous integration and you should too At Starship were constantly iterating and improving our products to provide our members with the best experience possibleltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat youll be doingltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDesigning scalable and resilient data pipelines and handle exponential member growth with confidenceltligtltligtContributing to an event driven software stack to keep auditors happyltligtltligtDesigning data models and workflows to make use of health financial dataltligtltligtCollaborating with engineers and product managers to make sure were building the right solutions for the right problemsltligtltligtDeveloping new userfacing featuresampnbspltligtltligtBuilding reusable code and libraries for future useampnbspltligtltligtEnsuring the technical feasibility of UIUX designsampnbspltligtltligtOptimizing application for maximum speed and scalabilityltligtltligtThoughtful communication through code and design reviewltligtltligtStriving to build great experiences and putting users ahead of technologyltligtltligtCollaborating with engineers and product managers to make sure were building the right solutions for the right problemsltligtltligtImproving our current techstack found here httpsstackshareiostarshipstarshipampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat youll bring to the teamltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtA willingness to work in a fastpaced startup environmentltligtltligtAbility to dive into complex systems and understand how they workltligtltligtExperience in implementing testable business logic that is secure and easy to maintainltligtltligtExperience with React React Native JavascriptTypescript and NodejsltligtltligtExperience in building and consuming various API endpoints GraphQL and working on payments features or companiesltligtltligtFamiliarity with message brokers and event streamseg AWS SNS SQS Azure ServiceBus or similarltligtltligtExperience working in high security environmentseg payments healthcareampnbspltligtltligtExperience in building both web and app productsltligtltligtiOS and Android experience is a plusltligtltligtMotion experience is a plusltligtltligtYou work with a sense of empathy for others both end users and your fellow engineersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat Starship offersltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWelcoming diverse and interesting colleagues from all walks of lifeampnbspampnbspltligtltligtCompetitive compensation packages including equityampnbspampnbspltligtltligtComprehensive benefits package including medical dental and visionampnbspinsuranceltligtltligtOf course the best HSAampnbspampnbspltligtltligtFlexible schedules and time offampnbspampnbspltligtltligtNew equipment so you can do your best workltligtltulgt
